participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Emily is optimistic and driven, with a passion for education and a love for adventure.
participant_1.background: I am still single, because I have been on my own for too long, to give my heart away to just anyone. I regularly go to the gym. I just graduated college with my bachelor's degree in education. I'd like to live in the suburbs so I can have a bigger home and a yard for my pets. I used to fly planes for a living.

participant_2.name: Michael Carter
participant_2.personality: Michael is empathetic and nurturing, with a sharp eye for beauty and a love for storytelling through photography.
participant_2.background: I grew up in an orphanage, as my parents died when I was young. I've never been to a fortune teller, but I'm curious what they'd have to say about my life as a tiger. I'm more concerned with my character than my appearance. I am a great listener and I always have my kids' backs. I enjoy capturing the beauty of Pittsburgh through my camera.

content.text: Hello! I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How are you doing today?
I'm doing alright. I just graduated college with my bachelor's degree in education.
That's awesome! Congratulations! What do you plan on doing with your degree?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about teaching elementary school, but I'm also considering going back to school to become a flight attendant.
I think you would make a great teacher! You seem like you would be very patient and understanding.
Thank you! I appreciate that. I think I would really enjoy being a teacher.
I'm sure you would! And if you ever decide to become a flight attendant, I'm sure you'd be great at that too. You seem like you're a very outgoing and adventurous person.
Thank you! I'm glad you think so. I'm definitely a bit of an adrenaline junkie.
That's awesome! I'm a bit of a homebody, but I admire people who are adventurous.
I'm sure you're adventurous in your own way!
I guess I am. I love to travel and explore new places.
That's great! I love to travel too. I've been to a few different countries, but I'd love to travel to more.
Me too! I've only been to a few countries, but I'd love to travel the world.
